text: Martín Mariano Boasso Danielle (born 11 April 1975 in El Trebol, Santa Fe) is an Argentine naturalized Mexican footballer. == External links == * Argentine Primera statistics * * Category:1975 births Category:Living people Category:Argentine footballers Category:People from San Martín Department, Santa Fe Category:Naturalized citizens of Mexico Category:Argentine emigrants to Mexico Category:Rosario Central footballers Category:Gimnasia y Esgrima de Jujuy footballers Category:Unión de Santa Fe footballers Category:Irapuato F.C. footballers Category:C.F.
